title: Harmony Falls
description: With her life shattered by tragedy, one man vows to heal her with the power—and the passion—of his love…Months after the tragedy that killed her husband and unborn child and nearly ended her own life, elementary school teacher Cassandra Miller is still racked with grief and guilt. With her future uncertain, a man from her past reenters her shattered world. Ten years ago, Wylie Everett was Cassandra's cherished friend and secret lover…until he walked away without a word of explanation.Wylie has loved Cassandra since he was a boy. Convinced that a poor kid from a troubled home would never be good enough, he left town…and Cassandra married his best friend. Now, home from war and bearing his own emotional scars, the rugged marine is determined to make amends. He takes her to Martha's Vineyard, where he's renovating a house. Being together again rekindles the desire that once rocked their young lives. Can they move beyond the pain and sorrow and rebuild themselves—together?Sensual and deeply moving, Harmony Falls is a story of survival, forgiveness and second chances.
author: Ginger Jamison
